objects.name: Data Collection and Analysis
objects.description: Gather and analyze geological, geophysical, and geochemical data.

objects.name: Seismic Survey
objects.description: Conduct a seismic survey to obtain a detailed image of the subsurface.

objects.name: Prospect Evaluation
objects.description: Evaluate prospects based on their potential to contain hydrocarbons.

objects.name: Risk Assessment
objects.description: Perform a risk assessment to determine the probability of success for each prospect.

objects.name: Drilling Location Selection
objects.description: Choose the optimal drilling location based on prospect evaluation and risk assessment.

objects.name: Drilling Plan Development
objects.description: Develop a detailed drilling plan outlining objectives, well design, equipment, and procedures.

objects.name: Drilling Operations
objects.description: Execute the drilling plan, ensuring safety and environmental regulations are followed.

objects.name: Well Logging and Testing
objects.description: Perform well logging and testing to gather data on reservoir properties and hydrocarbon potential.

objects.name: Data Integration and Analysis
objects.description: Integrate and analyze data from drilling, well logging, and testing operations.

objects.name: Field Development and Production
objects.description: Proceed with field development and production if the well is economically viable.

objects.name: Geological Maps, Satellite Imagery, Well Data
Reservoir Size, Porosity, Permeability, Hydrocarbon Saturation
Drilling Objectives, Well Design, Equipment, Operational Procedures
